reviews.review: 作为一款9年前的游戏，它依然非常好玩，虽然我不喜欢这种类型的游戏，但是它真的非常好玩，无论是剧情，射击手感都非常出色，唯一感到不满的是实在太暗了。。。。。

В свое время было очень весело рубить с друзьями нечисть. 
10 порубленных зомбей из 10

Игра хороша! Бегать, стрелять, кричать "перезаряжай быстрее"...умирать! Игра отвечает своим требованиям на деле. Порой просто боишься выйти из комнаты на улицу, это конечно если первый раз играть. А потом, когда стал более опытным игроком, "включаешь" крутого парня и мочишь их всех как тряпку половую! Первая часть заявила о себе весьма и весьма громко! Это хорошое начало!

Best... zombie... game... ever... at the time. Hands down. 
There is only one better and that is Left 4 dead 2, but it wouldn't exist if not for this one.

My zombie shooter list is simple:

1. Left 4 dead 2
2. Left 4 dead

You don't need a 3th with these 2.

Muy buen juego a pesar de que casi siempre esta vacio el online, aunque se llega a llenar una sala a veces.

En cuanto a apartado grafico no me puedo quejar esta muy bien y me corre excelente a pesar de tener una piedra por computadora.
Sometimes, less is more.

Left 4 Dead.  What can I say?  I'm finally atoning for past sins by FINALLY PURCHASING THIS GAME ON STEAM.  I've put countless hours into this game before buying it so don't mistake my mere number of hours logged on Steam for lack of time playing.

  If you enjoy killing hordes of zombies that were once people with kids, families, wives, husbands, bakers, bankers, lawyers (I mean come on now, what kind of zombie would a lawyer be without ACTUALLY being a zombie?), this game is definitely for you.  Even for being about 10 years old this game is still a treat to play.

Pros:
+ The game has aged surprisingly well in the past 10 years.  Like wine, this game gets better with age
+ graphically still pleasing on the eyes
+ HORDES OF ZOMBIES
+ "The director", an internal AI piece of shit that sends an ass ton of zombies at you if it deems you haven't been in trouble for awhile
+ Running gags in-game that each chapter of the campaign is its own little movie
+ Is a little terrifying when you don't know what's going to happen
+ co-op is always a plus and it comes from the days when LAN was still a thing
+ surprises around every corner
+ Teamwork is truly a thing in this game but remember it's not Killing Floor or KF2

Cons:
- for people who enoy ADS in their FPS games, there isn't any.  It's like UNLOVED in that aspect (personally I don't mind this)
- the graphics HAVE AGED a little but they're not BAD, and in fact are still good (so not so much of a con)
- the modest selection of weapons is a little bland but it's not a dealbreaker (pistols/dual wield pistols, shotgun, M16/M4, .22 hunting rifle)

2008/2008: would play  10 year old game for hours on end to kill hordes of the undead.

Ik kreeg deel 2 gratis en vond die zo leuk dat ik deel 1 gekocht heb. Dit spel is echt een aanrader. Het werkt goed en snel op goedkopere laptops.

Ik ben nog bezig om elk level uit te spelen op makkelijk nivo. Zelf op dit nivo is het best nog een uitdaging. Ik speel het op twee systemen. 1 met de touchpad en dat gaat best goed.

Als je zombies wilt knallen en best veel speeluren wilt dan is dit spel wel een aanrader.

Left 4 Dead is a zombie survival game heavily focused on teamwork. If you don't stick with your team, your chances of survival are next to nothing. The game has an amazing atmosphere and soundtrack. It feels eerie, which is good! Apocalypses are eerie! 9/10.
[h1]和行尸走肉相比，求生之路简直是童话。[/h1]

Seguro ya sabes que es left4dead asi que probablemente estas considerando comprarlo porque aparte de todo no tiene muchos requisitos asi que te digo de una vez que yo que tengo una laptop que no corre ni el gta 4 me va bien

Overall, I would say this is a pretty solid game, and a great co op experience.

But, there are problems. one thing that really sticks out to me is the AI for the other survivors in single player. The AI is so dumb that it makes expert difficulty almost impossible, and its not even that hard otherwise. the AI tend to stand out in the open, barely moving or dodging zombies, just spraying. this may not be a big deal on easier difficulties but it pretty much forces you to play co op if you want to do it on harder difficulties. BUT, no one plays this anymore. you wont find anymore matches. so you need to convince 3 friends to buy and play the game with you. which is a problem for me since... well, i dont have friends.

Apart from that, this game is really fun. L4D2 is more fun and has more players, but i personally prefer the characters in this game.
Highly reccomended. Really fun with friends
Malgré une ancienneté du jeu, il reste toujours aussi indémodable avec ses zombies à la pelle !

Nostalgia Alert. Zombies, bigger zombies and even bigger zombies. Guns and Traps and Fire. Cant beat a good ol game of left 4 dead
No Player ??

Un basura. 
Cualquier juego en beta está mejor hecho que esta porquería.
La sensación de aburrimiento y frustración al no poder defenderte nunca de los enemigos especiales cuando te atacan es penoso. El smocker te atrapa muchas veces, aún estando detrás de las paredes. 
Los mapas son espantosamente monótonos y sin nada de creatividad, totalmente lineal. Y para colmo cada vez que un zombi normal te toca, no te puedes mover aunque quieras escapar, y te obliga matarlos de manera lamentable, porque muchas veces, por mucho que les dispares no mueren. 
Y además te salen zombies nuevos mágicamente de zonas cerradas (callejones sin salida, etc) en los cual ya has pasado y has matado a todo lo que había. Pues mágicamente vuelven a aparacer con la excusa barata del "factor sorpresa".
El juego es una jodida basura. Apto solamente para subnormales.
Lo que viene a ser un auténtico timo.
nice game！
Far superior to it's sequel, L4D2. Runs and plays smoother, much better atmosphere and zombie designs... Can't go wrong with a Valve classic!

Игра хороша только когда вы играете с друзьями. В одного не советую играть. Проще перечислить плюсы и минусы:
+ В коопе можно хорошо отдохнуть.
+ Сетевой режим тоже хорошь.
- С ботами скучно играть, но они всегда помогают.
- Сюжета практически нет. Даже чем игра кончается не понятно.
- Боевая механика так себе.
Итог: шутан для игры с друзьями. Моя оценка 7/10.

Игра по моему чемто бональна , но завлекает неплохой графикой и системой повреждений и рэгдолов . В плане сюжета скажу одно " это очень неплохо ". Больше всего мне понравилась локации "Нет милосердию" и "Смерть в воздухе". Почти все зомби имеют разные модельки (Кроме особых) и это радует . В игре сохраняется отмосфера апокалипсиса . И это мне как заядлому ветерану старой игры C.Т.А.Л.К,Е.Р. несомненно нравится .

jogo muito bom, é um jogo muito legal de se jogar online, eu não joguei com nenhum amigo mas mesmo assim é legal jogar com desconhecidos, é um jogo que tem que ser jogado com pessoas, porque jogar sozinho com os bots é chato, ele tem uma historia de fundo, acho os personagens interessantes, tem muitos infectados na tela, é até um jogo leve, um problema grave é o lag, se você jogar num servidor br o ping vai ser baixo, mas se jogar em servidor de gringo você vai sofrer lag, o problema do lag desse jogo é que vai ficar bem ruim de jogar, os infectados meio que te bugam e não fica muito divertido matar os infectados lagado, a valve cometeu um vacilo, não nesse jogo, mas ao lançar uma "continuação" desse jogo, a continuação saiu mais ou menos um ano depois do lançamento do primeiro, isso fez jogadores migrarem pro 2, não bastando isso a valve aparentemente quis matar o primeiro com o 2, porque ele tem boa parte dos mapas do primeiro, os quatro personagens do primeiro e tambem os infectados, o 2 so adiciona armas brancas, as animações deram uma mudada (prefiro as do primeiro), mais armas de fogo, quatro novos personagens e novos mapas, mas mesmo assim recomendo o primeiro
Es bastante aburrido si ya tienes el l4d2, basicamente es lo mismo solo que en el 2 hay mas zombies, mapas y personajes.

The game itself is great but the community makes the game a horrible experience.
I do not reccomend this game unless you have people you can play with. 
I bought this game when it first came out. Back then the community was much more vibrant and decent. After taking a few years off for school, I came back just to witness bullying and angry people. 

Pros
+Balanced Game: 4 infected and 4 survivors in versus mode
+Graphics are decent
+There is campaign and survival mode besides versus
+Mods
+Downloadable user made maps

Cons
-People can still use hacks in this game
-Would be fun if there are more objectives
-Limited use of weapons 

COMMUNITY--------------------------------------------------
Buy this game at your own risk. Only 3% of the people who still play this game are patient and reasonable. The other 97% are pedophiles, toxic people, attention whores and losers. 

If you dont know how to play people will kick you out. If you know how to play, others will accuse you of hacks and kick you out. If you are a girl, older men in their 60s or 30s, 40s will try to lead you on. If you are a boy, older girls will try to befriend you and suck up to you. Cyberbullying at its finest. People who spread rumors to get rid of you. Girls who are adults but act like middle schoolers. Girls (adults) who try to date as many boys as possible in this game. Boys who cry but are adults and act like middle schoolers. Boys (adults) who will try to date as many girls in this game as possible. Hence why this game is only for losers. But hey! If youre a loser and you love drama then this community is defintely for you!

Your risk. Your choice. 
If you still want to play then I suggest you to find decent people to play with. I would avoid the community as much as possible unless you love drama. I love this game but the people who still play it make this a horrible experience. I am glad I never came back during my college years.

I bought this game to try something new. It was on a super sale, so I thought, "Why not?" and bought the bundle. I went in completely blind not knowing anything other than this game was a first-person-zombie-shooter and one of the characters wore a red jacket. So I think that made my enjoyment of it a lot better.

If you like challengeing gameplay, shooting zombies, occasionally witty dialogue and a ton of replayability, I'd totally recommend this game.
